name: Solar Explorers
description:
A game about exploring a small solar system with your friends.

Requires at least 2 players and Steam to be installed.

Instructions: Open steam, then open the game. One player clicks on the "Host Game" button. After loading in, open the steam overlay with Shift+Tab and invite your friends. Your friends should open the game and without clicking "Host Game" accept the invite from the overlay.

Controls:

WASD to move.

Mouse to look around.

Mouse wheel to scroll through tools.

E to interact or pick up items.

G to dismount vehicles.

C for third person mode
